title: Aditya Birla group adds Yauatcha, Hakkasan and more brands to its menu with latest buyout
description: Aditya Birla New Age Hospitality has acquired 100% stake in KA Hospitality Private, the firm owning CinCin and franchise rights of global restaurant brands Hakkasan, Yauatcha, and Nara Thai. The four brands are placed across the customer value pyramid, spreading through the mid-market to premium segments.
